scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./miaow-config/index -c=ke
scripts.debug: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect-brk ./miaow-config/index -h -c=ke -m=main-wap
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./miaow-config/index -h -c=ke
scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./miaow-config/index -w -c=ke
scripts.start-ng: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./miaow-config/index -w -c=ng
scripts.start-gh: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./miaow-config/index -w -c=gh
scripts.release.mv: rimraf ./release && npm run release.mv.html && npm run release.mv.ftl
scripts.prerelease-build: npm run set-loglevel && npm run clean
scripts.release.test1: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production CDN="test.sporty.net" npm run release-build -- -c=ke
scripts.release: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run release-build -- -c=ke
scripts.release-ng.test1: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  CDN="test.sporty.net" npm run release-build  -- -c=ng
scripts.release-ng: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run release-build  -- -c=ng
scripts.release-gh.test1: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  CDN="test.sporty.net" npm run release-build  -- -c=gh
scripts.release-gh: npm install --no-optional -s && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run release-build  -- -c=gh
